Posts.Content: Jamienono wrote: Hi!  I am 26. I found a lump in my left breast 3 months ago. Still there, it's hard, doesn't move, no pain, and I have some bloody discharge from that nipple:( I seen my Dr Friday and he is sending me for an ultrasound ASAP and a mammogram second, if needed. I am so so scared! My doc seemed really concerned, which made me even more afraid of what this could be. Anyone else have this and no cancer? Any suggestions, stories, tips? Thank you:)  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Scared!! Jamienono Warrior_Woman

Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2014 03:52PM Jamienono wrote: I am 26, and yes it was a breast specialist. He was just, well, a jerk!  Thank you all! I will be getting another refferal tomorrow when my Dr's office opens!
Posts.Title: Breast Ultrasound - I am so angry!!! Jamienono Jamienono

Posts.Content: Mar 9, 2014 11:02AM Jamienono wrote: So sorry for the late respond. I went back and had another ultrasound and mammogram done and nothing was found the doctors took very very good care of me, answered all my questions and said that If I want to come back in three months if I still feel the same lump or six months that i am mor than welcome to. they just offered me to come in if something changes or I have anymore questions or concerns!!!
Posts.Title: Breast Ultrasound - I am so angry!!! Jamienono Jamienono

Posts.Content: Jamienono wrote: I am so angry! The Dr that did my ultra sound was in and out in 5 minutes:( he put the ultrasound wand on my breast for maybe 30seconds and said nothing is wrong and you are too young to be worried about BC... And then walked out! I was in shock!  Now the lump that I had feels different, maybe bigger but it almost feels larger and holy... I don't know how to describe it, it feels like a bunch of little pebbles now instead of just one. I don't know what to do... Any advice? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast Ultrasound - I am so angry!!! Jamienono Jamienono

Posts.Content: Jan 19, 2014 11:37AM Jamienono wrote: Thank you all!! I will definitely get a second opinion!!! I really hope it's nothing, but my gut keeps telling me to get it figured out!  I just have this weird feeling something is not right! I have never felt this sense of urgency  before... I will also look into the "second opinion" section:) Thank you:)
